content.text:
# 29th Japan Film Professional Awards

The  was the 29th edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. In addition to ranking the best films of 2019, ten films were selected as the best of the decade (2010-2019). An award ceremony did not take place. Unlike previous years, no acting awards were given.
Awards
*Best Film of 2019: Miyamoto
*Best Film of the 2010s: Happy Hour
*Movie MVP of the 2010s: Ryusuke Hamaguchi (Happy Hour, Asako I & II, )
